price: 109਼ ਕੁੱਝ ਵੀ ਸ਼ੱਕ ਨਹੀਂ ਕਿ ਇਹੋ ਲੋਕ ਆਖ਼ਿਰਤ ਵਿਚ ਘਾਟੇ ਵਿਚ ਰਹਿਣਗੇ।
arabic: لَا جَرَمَ أَنَّهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمُ ٱلۡخَٰسِرُونَ

version.title: Punjabi translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Punjabi by Arif Halim, published by Darussalam

meta.transliteration: lā jarama annahum fī al-ākhirati humu al-khāsirūna
